name: Name
desc: Description/Prompt

name: Indestructible Vajra Body
desc: One of the seventy-two supreme techniques of Shaolin, the whole body is as hard as diamond, invulnerable to weapons.

name: Golden Bell Shield
desc: Gathers qi into a bell to protect the body and reflect external forces.

name: Evergreen Art
desc: Cultivating health and prolonging life, with long breath, a basic cultivation method for mortals.

name: Azure Emperor Wood Emperor Art
desc: Absorbing the essence of plants, life is unending, with vast imperial qi.

name: Ruoshui Formula
desc: The highest good is like water, water benefits all things without competing, soft and mellow.

name: Black Emperor Water Emperor Fist
desc: Driving the flowing black water, as if the emperor himself arrives, grand and magnificent.

name: Fire Spirit Formula
desc: The most basic spell, gathering fire to hurt enemies, simple and practical.

name: Pure Yang Infinite Art
desc: Pure Yang qi, fierce and unyielding, restraining cold and evil.

name: Mountain Moving Formula
desc: Able to lift a tripod with strength, with long physical power, like a tiger coming down the mountain.

name: Immovable Wisdom King Formula
desc: Immovable as a mountain, moving like a thunderbolt, a Buddhist guardian divine skill.

name: Ice Heart Formula
desc: The heart is clear as ice, heaven falling will not startle, focusing and calming the mind.

name: Profound Ice Power
desc: Cold qi reaches the bone, freezing meridians, sinister and overbearing.

name: Divine Movement Hundred Transformations
desc: Agile movement, ever-changing, first-rate for escaping.

name: Cloud Treading Step
desc: Wudang's supreme skill, left foot stepping on the right foot, directly up to the green clouds.

name: Breath Concealment Technique
desc: Concealing breath, like dead wood and cold ashes, making it difficult for others to detect.

name: Ghostly Shadow Track
desc: Elusive as a ghost, with mysterious steps.

name: Palm Lightning
desc: A righteous Daoist spell, lightning emitted from the palm, intimidating evil spirits.

name: Five Thunders Orthodoxy
desc: Employing the five elements of thunder, fierce and overbearing, indestructible.

name: Blood Burning Grand Art
desc: Burning essence blood for a short burst of strength, followed by weakness.

name: Star Absorbing Grand Art
desc: Absorbing others' internal power for own use, extraordinarily overbearing, often with backlash.

name: Grass Word Sword Formula
desc: A single blade of grass cuts through the sun, moon, and stars, one of the three great sword formulas of the Perfect World.

name: Divine Sword Lightning Control True Formula
desc: Nine heavens profound lightning, transformed into divine thunder. Grand heavenly majesty, guided by the sword.

name: Great River Sword Intent
desc: Don't you see the Yellow River's water coming from the sky, rushing to the sea and never returning.

name: Azure Emperor Longevity Formula
desc: Created by the Azure Emperor, the highest Wood-system cultivation method, unending life, dead wood encountering spring.

name: God Elephant Overpowering Prison Strength
desc: Guiding spirit with qi, forming an elephant with spirit, every move suppresses hell.

name: Kunpeng Treasure Technique
desc: Entering the sea as a Kun, rising as a Peng. Yin-Yang changes, extreme speed and devouring.

name: Void Scripture
desc: Proving the Dao through infinite void, controlling space, inherently invincible.

name: Supreme Amorous Record
desc: Supreme amorousness is not emotionless, but forgetting emotion. Utmost justice and fairness, with infinite power.

name: Carefree Travel
desc: Riding the correctness of heaven and earth, and controlling the changes of the six qi to travel infinitely.

name: Heaven Devouring Demonic Art
desc: Created by the Ruthless Emperor, devouring ten thousand constitutions to forge the Chaos Body.

name: Heavenly Demonic Manual
desc: The highest treasure book of the demonic gate, all-encompassing, pointing directly to shattering the void.

name: Styx True Scripture
desc: The sea of blood never dries, the Styx never dies. Evolves into 480 million blood god sons.

name: Flame Formula
desc: Evolving the technique by devouring exotic flames, with infinite potential, commanding all fires.

name: Dao Heart Demonic Seed Grand Art
desc: Using others as furnaces to plant demonic seeds, seizing the creation of heaven and earth.

name: Great Derivation Formula
desc: Specializing in divine sense, able to multitask and control ten thousand puppets.

name: Great Bliss Ode
desc: The Great Dao of Yin and Yang, ascending in extreme bliss. The highest method of dual cultivation.

name: Heavenly Demonic Dance
desc: The dance of extraterrestrial demons, soul-hooking and mind-disturbing.

name: Lingbo Microsteps
desc: Moving as fast as a flying duck, elusive as a god, socks creating dust.

name: Past Amitabha Scripture
desc: The soul is indestructible, transcending to the other shore. Cultivating the past two constants, eternal through ten thousand calamities.

name: Shenxiao Lightning Method
desc: The orthodox Daoist lightning method, employing Shenxiao heavenly thunder to eliminate evil.

name: Nine Character Mantras
desc: Lin, Bing, Dou, Zhe, Jie, Zhen, Lie, Qian, Xing. The supreme incantation of the Daoist gate.

name: Underworld Ghost Claw
desc: Sinister and ruthless, specifically breaking internal true qi, death upon touch.

name: Three Thousand Lightning Movements
desc: Body transforming into lightning, thousands of miles in an instant, with many afterimages.

name: Blood Nerve Scripture
desc: Human skin as paper, fresh blood as ink. Cultivators must first skin and devour blood.

name: Divine Mechanism Hundred Refinements
desc: The peak of artifact refining, turning decay into magic, everything can be a weapon.

name: Great Array of Stellar Constellations
desc: Attracting the stellar power of the sky, evolving the universe and wilderness, combining offense and defense.

name: Ground Shrinking Golden Light
desc: A supreme skill of the Chan Sect, transforming into a golden light, thousands of miles in an instant.
